isPermaLink="false">http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/taylor-swift-taylor-momsen-style-inspiration</guid><title>Photo Proof That Taylor Swift Is Just Copying Taylor Momsen's Style</title><link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/fuse/latest/~3/bfYVuYjuvdE/taylor-swift-taylor-momsen-style-inspiration</link><description>Taylor Swift revealed her new, platinum blond-haired look on the May cover of 'Vogue,' which brought on a major, darker fashion transformation. But Swift channeling her inner '90s goth/rock/grunge girl (with a mainstream twist) isn't a new concept! In fact, she appears to be copying a singer who has been doing this look for a long time—The Pretty Reckless frontwoman Taylor Momsen.<img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/fuse/latest/~4/bfYVuYjuvdE" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 09:35:00 +0000</pubDate><feedburner:origLink>http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/taylor-swift-taylor-momsen-style-inspiration</feedburner:origLink></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/lupita-nyongo-black-panther-movie</guid><title>Lupita Nyong'o in Talks to Star in Marvel's 'Black Panther'</title><link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/fuse/latest/~3/0ElLJou8pOc/lupita-nyongo-black-panther-movie</link><description>Lupita Nyong'o is reportedly in talks to star in Marvel's 'Black Panther' alongside Chadwick Boseman, who played the character in 'Captain America: Civil War.'<img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/fuse/latest/~4/0ElLJou8pOc" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 09:30:00 +0000</pubDate><feedburner:origLink>http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/lupita-nyongo-black-panther-movie</feedburner:origLink></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/mark-ronson-interview-lady-gaga-album-tease</guid><title>Mark Ronson Teases Lady Gaga's 'Analog' Album: Watch</title><link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/fuse/latest/~3/FUlfGWSkGg0/mark-ronson-interview-lady-gaga-album-tease</link><description>Mark Ronson teased Lady Gaga's 'Analog' album while in conversation with Charlie Rose. Learn all about the highly anticipated follow-up to 2013's 'Artpop' here!<img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/fuse/latest/~4/FUlfGWSkGg0" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 09:02:00 +0000</pubDate><feedburner:origLink>http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/mark-ronson-interview-lady-gaga-album-tease</feedburner:origLink></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/meghan-trainor-me-too-video-ricky-reed-interview</guid><title>Meghan Trainor Producer: Photoshopped Video Started ‘Long-Overdue Conversation’</title><link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/fuse/latest/~3/SZ6w_2rz_eQ/meghan-trainor-me-too-video-ricky-reed-interview</link><description>Ricky Reed, who executive-produced Trainor’s new album 'Thank You' (out tomorrow) and helmed her Top 10 smash “No,” applauds the pop star for speaking her mind about the doctored "Me Too" video.<img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/fuse/latest/~4/SZ6w_2rz_eQ" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 07:56:00 +0000</pubDate><feedburner:origLink>http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/meghan-trainor-me-too-video-ricky-reed-interview</feedburner:origLink></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.fuse.tv/videos/2016/05/michael-ian-black-interview-noted-expert-special</guid><title>Michael Ian Black Previews New Stand-Up Special 'Noted Expert': Video Interview</title><link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/fuse/latest/~3/rrqVADIQFZU/michael-ian-black-interview-noted-expert-special</link><description>'Michael Ian Black: Noted Expert' is tactor/author/tweeter's first stand-up release in five years. 12 May 2016 06:54:00 +0000</pubDate><feedburner:origLink>http://www.fuse.tv/videos/2016/05/michael-ian-black-interview-noted-expert-special</feedburner:origLink></item><item><guid Albums</title><link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/fuse/latest/~3/JYVWfZLGGQM/no-more-coldplay-albums-hiatus-retired</link><description>Coldplay singer/frontman Chris Martin discussed the band's future with Zane Lowe on Beats 1 and said he'd "be surprised if there was another conventional Coldplay album" and more about the group's future.<img It is planned to be released in 2017.<img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/fuse/latest/~4/a_vNQbS-PmI" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 04:27:00 +0000</pubDate><feedburner:origLink>http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/courtney-love-possibility-of-fireflies-film</feedburner:origLink></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/billy-corgan-bernie-sanders-donald-trump-supporters</guid><title>Billy Corgan Does Not Like Bernie Sanders or Donald Trump Supporters</title><link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/fuse/latest/~3/fdGFMFkzazc/billy-corgan-bernie-sanders-donald-trump-supporters</link><description>Smashing Pumpkins frontman Billy Corgan is not down with Bernie Sanders or Donald Trump supporters. That’s what we’re asking ourselves now that Tyga and Kylie Jenner reportedly are no more.<img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/fuse/latest/~4/X95ewE8bwq0" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 04:22:00 +0000</pubDate><feedburner:origLink>http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/tyga-kylie-jenner-split-breakup</feedburner:origLink></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/rocket-raccoon-avengers-infinity-war</guid><title>Rocket Raccoon of 'Guardians of the Galaxy' May Join 'Avengers: Infinity War'</title><link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/fuse/latest/~3/QT7uAaYyL_w/rocket-raccoon-avengers-infinity-war</link><description>Can Rocket Raccoon just join all the future Marvel movies? We'll take 'Guardians of the Galaxy 2' and 'Avengers: Infinity War' as a start, but...<img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/fuse/latest/~4/QT7uAaYyL_w" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 04:03:00 +0000</pubDate><feedburner:origLink>http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/rocket-raccoon-avengers-infinity-war</feedburner:origLink></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/rocky-horror-picture-show-reboot-laverne-cox-dr-frank-n-furter</guid><title>'Rocky Horror Picture Show' Reboot: See Laverne Cox as Dr. Frank-N-Furter</title><link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/fuse/latest/~3/tSDdyLyPawo/rocky-horror-picture-show-reboot-laverne-cox-dr-frank-n-furter</link><description>Laverne Cox revealed the first look of her Dr. Frank-N-Furter in Fox's 'Rocky Horror Picture Show' reboot. The 'Orange Is the New Black' actress says the character aided in her own self-acceptance: "It's been wonderful claiming my chest voice. It's been really healing."<img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/fuse/latest/~4/tSDdyLyPawo" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description><pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 03:53:00 +0000</pubDate><feedburner:origLink>http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/rocky-horror-picture-show-reboot-laverne-cox-dr-frank-n-furter</feedburner:origLink></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.fuse.tv/2016/05/the-misfits-reunite-glenn-danzig-33-years</guid><title>The Misfits Reunite With Glenn Danzig After 33 Years</title><link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/fuse/latest/~3/iaXJnsZH4Hs/the-misfits-reunite-glenn-danzig-33-years</link><description>Glenn Danzig will reunite with the Misfits for the first time in 33 years this Fall.
